description: Power and charge everything.  Featuring 2 USB charging ports and 12 standard US 3-prong grounded power outlets with sliding covers (4 oversized) with surge suppression rated to 4320 Joules.USB ChargingSignals Apple and other devices to charge at up to 2.1A.  Power is shared between the two available USB charging ports.Surge Suppression12 protected power outlets4320 Joules of protection2-in-1 power / circuit breaker switchBuilt-in EMI/RFI filterUL/cUL RatedWall mountableSpecificationsFor 120V AC / 60Hz (US plugs)Capacity 15A, 1800 wattsClamping voltage 330VMax Spike Voltage 6,000VResponse time < 1 nsEMI/RFI Filter range 150Khz - 100 MhzEMI/RFI Filter Attenuation 58dBUSB Devices Confirmed to ChargeiPad, iPhone, iPod (all generations)Most Android devices (Nexus 4 and 7, Samsung Galaxy S4, Droid Bionic, etc.)Most Windows devices (Nokia 710, 900; HTC 8X, etc.)In the box12 inch by 6 inch surge surpression power strip and charger, with 6 foot attached power cable to wall. US style plugs.
title: Plugable 12 Outlet Power Surge Protector with Built-in Dual USB Charging Ports for Samsung Galaxy S4, iPad, iPod, iPhone and other USB Tablet and Phone Devices
